result.title: Unexpected prob
result.content:
In http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/408/A i am facing a problem... My compiler gives me the exact result expected by codeforces.. but when i submit my code to codeforces.. It returns me wrong answar... Please help me to figure it out... Here is my code.

include

using namespace std;

int main() { int n,i,j,a[100],b=0,result,fresult,l=1; //cout<<"input n"; cin>>n;

int k[n],f_result[n];
for(i=0;i<n;i++)//input no of cashes
{
    cin>>k[i];
}
i=0;
f_result[0]=999999;
do
{
    result=0;

    for(j=0;j<k[i];j++)//input no of people per cashes
    {
        cin>>a[j];
        result=result+(a[j]*5)+15;//calculate the time

    }
    f_result[i]=result;
    if(f_result[l]>f_result[l-1])//calculate minimum time
        {
           f_result[l]=f_result[l-1];
           fresult=f_result[l];
        }
    i++;
    b++;
    l++;
}
while(b<n);
cout<<fresult;//print the result
return 0;

}
